data.name: Kronorite
data.detailed_description:
yeah that's pretty much it; we're some random 17yo dudes who wanted to make a game and oh well here we are



Shoot some dudes with the bow or go tryhard with the sword on some innocent guys while trying to gather as much land as possible in the arena. one kill = you occupy one unit of land from the other's team territory. oh yeah and it's 5vs5



so it's pretty easy actually:
the match is composed out of two alternating phases which we call BUILDING TIME and COMBAT TIME. during the building time, well, you build stuff so you don't get one-shot during the combat time. (easy enough, right) the two teams are separated by a force field down the middle of the arena which later on advances or or recedes according to the kills that will have been made.



We're glad you asked:
  • the most advanced building system in a game (and we mean it)
  • 3 unique environments
  • 2 classes, more to come
  • stupid emotes that you get by playing
  • powerups to make things more spicy
  • leveling & ranking systems so you can track how much time you've wasted from your life
  • i mean what more do you want

data.short_description: Build during the building time so you can stay alive and fight during the combat time. Make killstreaks to get powerups to make EVEN MORE KILLSTREAKS FOR EVEN MORE POWERUPS!!! Kill as much as you can while staying alive for as long as you can to advance as much as possible.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 TI
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.2GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
